com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.component.model

Interface WebCmsComponentModelService


  • public interface WebCmsComponentModelService
    Core API for interacting with renderable/editable WebCmsComponentModels.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebCmsComponentModelSet buildComponentModelSetForOwner(WebCmsObject object, boolean eager)
      Build a WebCmsComponentModelSet for all components owned by the WebCmsObject, and attached to the current domain.
      WebCmsComponentModelSet buildComponentModelSetForOwner(WebCmsObject object, WebCmsDomain domain, boolean eager)
      Build a WebCmsComponentModelSet for all components owned by the WebCmsObject, and attached to the specified domain.
      WebCmsComponentModel buildModelForComponent(WebCmsComponent component)
      Build the WebCmsComponentModel for a particular WebCmsComponent entity.

      Create a new component model for a specific component type, on the current domain.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentType

        WebCmsComponentType getComponentType(String componentTypeKey)
        Get the component type represented by the type key. Will use the current domain to look for component types.
        Parameters:
        componentTypeKey - type key
        Returns:
        type or null if not found

      • getComponentType

        WebCmsComponentType getComponentType(String componentTypeKey,
                                     WebCmsDomain domain)
        Get the component type represented by the type key on the specified domain.
        Parameters:
        componentTypeKey - type key
        domain - to scan
        Returns:
        type of null if not found

      • createComponentModel

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U createComponentModel(String componentTypeKey,
                                                        Class<U> expectedType)
        Create a new component model for a specific component type.
        Parameters:
        componentTypeKey - to create model for
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        model

      • createComponentModel

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U createComponentModel(String componentTypeKey,
                                                        WebCmsDomain domain,
                                                        Class<U> expectedType)
        Create a new component model for a specific component type on the specified domain. Component will be added to that domain and component type will be looked for in the domain.
        Parameters:
        componentTypeKey - to create model for
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        model

      • createComponentModel

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U createComponentModel(WebCmsComponentType componentType,

        Create a new component model for a specific component type, on the current domain.
        Parameters:
        componentType - to create model for
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        model

      • getComponentModel

        WebCmsComponentModel getComponentModel(String objectId)
        Get the component model for a specific WebCmsComponent identified by its object id.
        Parameters:
        objectId - of the component
        Returns:
        component model or null if not a valid component

      • getComponentModel

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U getComponentModel(String objectId,
                                                     Class<U> expectedType)
        Get the component model for a specific WebCmsComponent identified by its object id.
        Parameters:
        objectId - of the component
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        component model or null if not a valid component

      • getComponentModelByName

        WebCmsComponentModel getComponentModelByName(String componentName,
                                             WebCmsObject owner)
        Get a single WebCmsComponentModel for a specific owner by name. Calls getComponentModelByNameAndDomain(String, WebCmsObject, WebCmsDomain) with the domain of the owner object, if it is an instance of WebCmsComponentType, otherwise with the domain provided by com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.domain.WebCmsMultiDomainService#getCurrentDomainForType(Class).
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        owner - of the component
        Returns:
        component or null if not found

      • getComponentModelByNameAndDomain

        WebCmsComponentModel getComponentModelByNameAndDomain(String componentName,
                                                      WebCmsObject owner,
                                                      WebCmsDomain domain)
        Get a single WebCmsComponentModel for a specific owner by name and domain.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        owner - of the component
        domain - domain of the component
        Returns:
        component or null if not found

      • getComponentModelByName

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U getComponentModelByName(String componentName,
                                                           WebCmsObject owner,
                                                           Class<U> expectedType)
        Get a single WebCmsComponentModel by name. Will use the context-bound domain to lookup the component.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        owner - of the component
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        component or null if not found

      • getComponentModelByNameAndDomain

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U getComponentModelByNameAndDomain(String componentName,
                                                                    WebCmsObject owner,
                                                                    WebCmsDomain domain,
                                                                    Class<U> expectedType)
        Get a single WebCmsComponentModel for a specific owner by name and domain.
        Parameters:
        componentName - name of the component
        owner - of the component
        domain - domain of the component
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        component or null if not found

      • getComponentModelsForOwner

        Collection<WebCmsComponentModel> getComponentModelsForOwner(WebCmsObject object)
        Return all components owned by the WebCmsObject on the current domain, according to their sort order.
        Parameters:
        object - owner
        Returns:
        ordered collection of components

      • getComponentModelsForOwner

        Collection<WebCmsComponentModel> getComponentModelsForOwner(WebCmsObject object,
                                                            WebCmsDomain domain)
        Return all components owned by the WebCmsObject on the specific domain, according to their sort order.
        Parameters:
        object - owner
        domain - the components should be attached to
        Returns:
        ordered collection of components

      • buildComponentModelSetForOwner

        WebCmsComponentModelSet buildComponentModelSetForOwner(WebCmsObject object,
                                                       boolean eager)
        Build a WebCmsComponentModelSet for all components owned by the WebCmsObject, and attached to the current domain.

        The returned set only contains components with a configured name.

        Parameters:
        object - owner
        eager - true if component models should all be fetched eagerly, if false the set will only fetch the component when it is being requested
        Returns:
        set of components

      • buildComponentModelSetForOwner

        WebCmsComponentModelSet buildComponentModelSetForOwner(WebCmsObject object,
                                                       WebCmsDomain domain,
                                                       boolean eager)
        Build a WebCmsComponentModelSet for all components owned by the WebCmsObject, and attached to the specified domain.

        The returned set only contains components with a configured name.

        Parameters:
        object - owner
        domain - the components should be attached to
        eager - true if component models should all be fetched eagerly, if false the set will only fetch the component when it is being requested
        Returns:
        set of components

      • buildModelForComponent

        WebCmsComponentModel buildModelForComponent(WebCmsComponent component)
        Build the WebCmsComponentModel for a particular WebCmsComponent entity.
        Parameters:
        component - to build the model for
        Returns:
        model

      • buildModelForComponent

        <U extends WebCmsComponentModel> U buildModelForComponent(WebCmsComponent component,
                                                          Class<U> expectedType)
        Build the WebCmsComponentModel for a particular WebCmsComponent entity.
        Parameters:
        component - to build the model for
        expectedType - type to coerce to
        Returns:
        model

      • save

        WebCmsComponent save(WebCmsComponent component)
        Save a WebCmsComponent to the repository. If the component is a new component, this will build the component model before saving, ensuring support for component templates.
        Parameters:
        component - to save
        Returns:
        component

      • save

        WebCmsComponent save(WebCmsComponentModel componentModel)
        Save a WebCmsComponentModel to the repository. The return value is the main WebCmsComponent that this model represents.
        Parameters:
        componentModel - to save
        Returns:
        component
